texts.text:
Bedrock Edition Far Lands – A terrain generation error that formerly happened past roughly 12.5M blocks.
Bedrock Edition distance effects – Other distance effects, primarily due to floating point precision errors

World border – A customizable border associated with the world boundary
World boundary – The area defining the intended edges of the world
Java Edition distance effects – Precision loss associated with extreme distances
Java Edition hard limits – Limitations of the code and their in-game manifestation
Java Edition Far Lands
Java Edition Far Lands/Up to Infdev 20100325
Java Edition Far Lands/Infdev 20100327 to Beta 1.7.3
Java Edition Far Lands/After Beta 1.8
